# p5.j5

> Johnny-Five for Processing p5.js

p5.j5 brings the full Johnny-Five nodebots library to p5.js, enabling hardware interaction directly in web pages via WebSerial or WebUSB. No servers required.

## What it does
- Integrates Johnny-Five robotics/hardware library with p5.js creative coding
- Works directly in browsers using WebSerial or WebUSB APIs
- Supports any Arduino with Firmata sketch
- Enables sensor reading, motor control, and hardware interaction in p5.js sketches

## Quick Start
```html
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.0.0/p5.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://unpkg.com/p5.j5@1.1.0/dist/p5.j5.min.js"></script>
```

```javascript
function preload() { loadBoard(); }
function setup() { 
  const sensor = new five.Sensor('A0');
  sensor.on('change', () => console.log(sensor.value));
}
```

## Links
- Repository: https://github.com/monteslu/p5.j5
- Johnny-Five: http://johnny-five.io/
- p5.js: https://p5js.org/
